desc:
Next attack deal {%atk} of ATK as Physical damage,
<@ba.rem>Skill can be used when Operator is affected by a Negative Status, removing the status</br><@ba.rem>Can hold {} charge</>
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expand</>, ASPD {+}, ATK {+}, randomly attack enemies in Attack Range, each skill activation ASPD {+} for next skill activation (can stack {} times)

Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases slightly</>, ATK {+%}, attack <$ba.stun>stun</> enemies for {} seconds while <$ba.stun>stun</> main target for {} second, after every attack splash area <@ba.vup>increases</>, and ATK {+%}

<@ba.rem>Can switch between the initial state and the following state: </>
Attack Range<@ba.vup> reduced</>, attacks deal {atk%} of ATK as Physical damage, can bounce between enemies {cnt} times

Attacks deal {atk%} of ATK as Physical damage and <$ba.sluggish>slow</> enemies for {slow} seconds, projectile pause for a short time then deal {atk%} of ATK as Physical damage to enemies it passes through while returning
Each attack fire {} more projectiles, when recover all projectiles deal {atk%} of ATK as Physical damage and <$ba.sluggish>slow</> enemies for {slow} seconds to enemies in the 8 surrounding tiles
Sand Reckoner and Clockwork Fowlbeasts gain +{ATK%} ATK and {ASPD} ASPD
Summons +{ATK%}, priortize enemies with the highest weight, <$ba.sluggish>slow</> enemies for {slow} seconds
Increases the healing effectiveness of next heal to/by {healeff%} and the effect of the First Talent is increased to/by {talent}times
Attack interval <@ba.kw>reduced</>, +{ATK%} ATK, bounces per heal +{bounce};Papyrus only heal other highest Max HP operator in Attack Range as Primary target
